headline: America makes GDP data immutable by publishing it on Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana
summary: The US Department of Commerce has begun publishing official economic statistics directly on public blockchains, describing this as a new approach to transparency and data security. The pilot program launched on Aug. 28 includes nine networks, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, TRON, Stellar, Avalanche, Arbitrum One, Polygon PoS, and Optimism. The announcement confirmed, “The Department published an official hash of its quarterly GDP data release […] The post America makes GDP data immutable by

headline: U.S. Government Starts Pushing Economic Data Onto Blockchains as 'Proof of Concept'
summary: The U.S. Department of Commerce said it issued its gross domestic product data via nine blockchains, including Bitcoin, Ethereum and other crypto-world pathways.

raw.headline: U.S. Government Starts Pushing Economic Data Onto Blockchains as 'Proof of Concept'

headline: Crypto industry calls for new bill to protect DeFi devs following Tornado Cash founder conviction

headline: What the New White House 401(k) Order Means for Coinbase’s Soaring Share Price
summary: If you are watching Coinbase Global’s stock right now, you are definitely not alone. Crypto remains one of the market’s hottest debates, and Coinbase is right at the center of it all. Over the past year, the stock has put on a spectacular show with a gain of 64.1%, and since going public three years ago, Coinbase has seen its shares rocket up an unbelievable 371.5%. Even with last month’s hiccup—a 16.8% dip—the stock is up 2.9% in the past week and a solid 20.1% year-to-date. So, what’s...
